<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when it&#39;s terminator was removed were eventually replaced. This assertion</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: We need to delete the contents of OwnedModules, but Module&#39;s dtor</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Make MDOperand transparent for hashing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This overload of an implementation detail of the hashing library makes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// MDOperand hash to the same value as a \\a Metadata pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that overloading \\a hash&#95;value() as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     size&#95;t hash&#95;value(const MDOperand &amp;X) &#123; return hash&#95;value(X.get()); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// does not cause MDOperand to be transparent.  In particular, a bare pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// doesn&#39;t get hashed before it&#39;s combined, whereas \\a MDOperand would.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a39d14146994c17bdc69aa11467d6076c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a39d14146994c17bdc69aa11467d6076c">get&#95;hashable&#95;data</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdoperand">MDOperand</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>.get(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
